text: Milton Fonseca Pelissari is a retired handball player from Brazil. Milton competed at the 1992 Summer Olympics and the 1996 Summer Olympics. He was born on 25 February 1971.Miltinho == References == Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian handball players Category:Olympians for Brazil Category:Sportspeople from Rio Grande do Sul
title: Milton Fonseca Pelissari
